1522321.content:
“Evie?” Helen asked finally, “Didn’t we get a new intern recently?”

“Did we?”

“Yes. I’ve been putting her to work carrying communications across the office. Busy work really.” Helen touched her chin lightly, “Hannah, I believe is her name?”

“Oh yeah!” Evie’s gaunt brown face flashed of recognition, “She’s the scrawny one, right? She’s been skulking around my lab lately during her lunch. Do you think that bimbo’s got the brains to try something like that?”

“The lack of them, for sure.” Helen harrumphed, “You don’t suppose that Fräulein Hammond is… like us… do you, leibest?”

“Oh no.” Dr. McCarthy chuckled evily, a sadistic smile that sat too wide on her slender face slowly spreading from ear to ear, “No one is like us.”

Dr. Schwartz was a small woman. Portly, with round welcoming features. However, when the need arose, she was capable of so very much more. The flames that flickered in her eyes shone brighter and burned hotter than hellfire, and with good reason. Helen was the best she was at what they did, and it might be time to work their way out of their little slump. A certain intern was in need of correction.

“You are so very right.” Helen said with a small, but horrifying smile, “Let us instruct our young friend in such regards, yah?”

***


Over the next few weeks, Helen allowed herself to indulge. She was already a bit on the stocky side; her short stature and a taste for both German and Hispanic foods had left her at a pleasingly plump two hundred and thirty pounds before all this had started. However, using her vast control over her own mind, Helen made the necessary adjustments to her appetite. She could eat whatever she wanted (and in such quantities!), and she got to kick back a little to allow her newest project to do the heavy lifting. Admittedly, getting to kick her feet up and snack while bossing around her newest charge was quite enjoyable. Within that time, results were showing.

“Oh, I am such a terrible boss.” Helen said in a put-on sort of voice. The kind she used when talking to children. It was especially German, playing up her foreign status, “Lazing around all day while I stuff mein bauch.”

The chubby-chasing intern could only react inwardly as she watched the chubby woman stroke her bloated belly. Hannah Hammond had been subverting her boss’s every attempt at exercise for the past few weeks—she’d barely let Dr. Schwartz lift a finger for herself, and it was finally coming full circle. Combined with the appetite stimulants she’d been slipping into her coffee every morning and ensuring that every meal she gophered back to her office was full and rich in carbs, fats, and sugars, Hannah couldn’t have been more satisfied with herself. Dr. Schwartz must have put on thirty pounds by now.

“Hannah?” the tiny blue-haired woman purred, “Are you listening?”

“What? Of course!” Hannah snapped back to attention, her eyes diverting from the shy smile of pale blubber showing from underneath her blouse, “It’s no trouble at all, Helen.”

“Dr. Schwartz.” Helen corrected, “But aside from your familiarity, I am quite pleased with your internship so far. You have taken such a load off of mein shoulders…”

Hannah smiled, her tongue running along the inside of her teeth. She couldn’t wait until Dr. Schwartz was as big as Polluck was back home. They had so much in common—a little older, short, overworked. It was only a matter of time before the same strategy that pinned Polluck down behind her desk in blubber would do the same to the good doctor here. Hannah could just feel it. Today, Dr. Schwartz was cresting north of what had to have been two hundred and fifty pounds. By the end of her internship? Who knew how big that tiny little chair squasher could get?

“That is to say, I think you deserve a treat.” Helen smiled insidiously, very mindful of Hannah’s inner monologue that played plain as day across her face, “You are doing such a wonderful job, and I simply insist you order us something yummy.”

“U-Us?” Hannah smiled, “Of course! I’ll just… you know, I’ve got to—”

“Ach, I insist. Take the night off!” Helen’s wolfish grin making Hannah feel the slightest bit uneasy, “I won’t take a bite if you don’t enjoy it with me.”

Hannah gulped. But eventually, she complied.
1522321.title: Helen Hefts Herself Up

choices: Helen gets huge, all according to plan (1)
Helen gets huge, all according to plan (2)
15223211.content:
In the coming time, Helen only bore down harder on her intern. Hannah’s buttons were so easily pressed that it hardly took any effort at all to get her to compromise herself. All Helen had to do was lean back, untuck her growing tum, and complain about how full she was. Every time she came to work, Hannah was bombarded with subliminal imagery that picked at her fetish. Pick, pick, pick, that’s all Helen had to do.

On her desk was a framed photograph of herself and Dr. McCarthy. Tilting it ever so slightly made it so that Hannah could see the contrast between the once merely chubby woman and the blue-haired gourmand that sat behind the desk. She was another twenty pounds heavier after only a short time, and the contrast between the two Schwartzes became more apparent by the day. In the frame, a merely chubby scientist, and behind the desk was a woman nearing three hundred pounds and getting closer by the day. Instead of keeping the jar of candies on her desk filled for her patients, Dr. Schwartz had started keeping it half-emptied, to imply that she’d been snacking liberally of her own accord. She’d waited before switching to larger sizes, simply so she could watch Hannah squirm as her swelling shape threatened to pop right out of her sweaters, blouses, and bottoms.

It was quite fun, to say the least.

And Helen made sure that the only release that Hannah could find, at least while on the clock, was through food.

Hannah’s lunches with Dr. McCarthy had continued only because of Helen’s instructions. It was imperative that the two of them remain on speaking terms. Hannah would require the kind of prodding that only Dr. McCarthy could give.

“So Helen’s getting kind’ve fat these days.” Evie purred, slinking next to the poor undersexed heiress, “You have anything to do with that?”
Hannah’s heart nearly jumped right out of her chest. She’d almost choked on her cookies—crumbs spewed everywhere as she went into a loud coughing fit.

“N-No!” Hannah balked. Her whole life she’d been doing this, and Dr. McCarthy had been the only one to call her out like that! “Wh-Why would I—

“Relax. Personally? She’s had it coming to her.” Evie’s pronounced features contrasted to the drawn nature of her cheeks and face made her somewhat uncomfortable to look at when she made evil faces like that, “I think you’re doing a great job.”

“You… you do?” Hannah asked with a strange sense of hopefulness to her voice, “You’re… I’m not in trouble?”

“Trouble? Nooooo!” Dr. McCarthy snickered evilly to herself. This poor girl had no idea how much trouble she was in for. “In fact, I think it’s amazing. I can just see it now, can’t you?”

Hannah gulped, her hands working in and out of her bag of cookies.

God this was hot.

“You know, don’t play dumb. Helen’s going to be a real whale at this rate. Sweaty, that belly of hers sagging everywhere, so fat she can’t even make it down the hallways?” Evie was immensely amused by the idea herself, “Surrounded by all that jiggly fat?”

Hannah had emptied her bag, been made aware of the burning sensation in her sex. Hannah needed release.

“You probably don’t know this, but I design equipment for those fat hogs that let themselves get so morbidly obese that they can’t walk.” Dr. McCarthy readied the nail to drive Hannah home, “And if you keep this up… who knows? Maybe we’ll see Helen in—”

“I’VE GOT TO GO NOW.”

Hannah rose suddenly, discarded packages of swallowed snacks falling to her feet as she hurried out of the lab. Towards the bathroom. Towards anywhere with some privacy.

“Hey, don’t forget, you’re doing a great job!”

***


Now that Hannah had a comrade in arms in her war against Schwartz’s waistline, she found herself going to Dr. McCarthy a lot more. She spent more time in the lab, even after hours, and liberally indulged her newfound compatriot in her desires. Finally, someone who understood her. Someone she could talk to about her desires.

“It’s just…” Hannah, encouraged by the familiarity between them, had taken to talking with Evie while mindlessly grazing on food from the snack machines. Today was no exception. “I can’t tell if I’m doing enough. She’s started to slow down.”

“Oh no, keep it up.” Evie steepled her fingers across her flat chest as she watched Hannah scarf down sour cream and onion chips, “We’re just getting started.”

Hannah nodded, her soft face creasing slightly at what would surely grow into a fine second chin. Between Doctors Schwartz and McCarthy, Hannah never wanted much for food. They kept her well-fed during her internship, but the long hours she’d been putting in at the R&D department meant that she hadn’t had any time to tend to herself. All of her eggs were in the Schwartz basket for now, and it was so stressful. She just wasn’t gaining fast enough! Hannah needed a release.
Helen and Evie had made sure that food was that release.

“Here, drink this.” Dr. McCarthy pushed a small coffee cup and teabag towards the young intern, “It’ll calm your nerves.”
15223211.title: Enlisting Evie in Enlarging Helen

choices: Epilogue (1)
Epilogue (2)
152232111.content:
“Oh Han-nah!” Dr. Schwartz chirped chipperly from behind her desk, “I seem to have popped a button from my blouse! Would you be an absolute dear und help me find it?!”

Hannah was a sweating, panting mess. She’d just gotten back from delivering one of Schwartz’s epic meals, carrying it all by herself up through the lobby and holding it all together for god knows how many floors on the elevator. Dr. Schwartz had kept her behind the desk so much lately that her legs weren’t used to it anymore. Her chunky thighs pumped, struggling to support her bloating upper body as her tummy quaked with every step. The familiar smells had overwhelmed her—she knew that all of this was for her boss, but she was so hungry…

“Hfff… okaaaay…” Hannah whined, her eyes bulging at the sight of Helen’s bare naked belly showing for all to see. The lower three buttons had burst right out from her blouse, allowing that pale fleshy stomach to ooze out into her lap, spreading her thick thighs apart. Helen’s unrestrained gut hung between her legs, pouring off of the seat of her office chair. Her double chin creased around her neck, her cheeks burying her features. Dr. Schwartz was becoming buried in that greedy, squishably soft fat…

“Ach, I know, I’m turning into such a piglet.” Dr. Schwartz cupped her stomach with two chubby hands, “What is his name? Porky Pig.”

“Yuh…” Hannah licked her lips, “I… I have to…”

“But you must help me find my buttons!” Dr. Schwartz cried in faux helplessness, giving a falsified but showy, jiggling struggle against her bulk only to remain seated in her chair, “I can fix them if you help me find them, but you do not expect me to walk around with my belly hanging out all day?”

Hannah’s brain bluescreened. Food. Belly. Fat. Schwartz.

“Well, I suppose you are right. We can look after lunch.” Helen smiled devilishly as she kicked her chubby legs until she was back behind her desk, “Come Hannah, eat.”

Hannah smacked her lips and lumbered over. Her loins aching at the sight of her boss’s stomach sloshing freely in her lap. Forkful after forkful, Hannah could only stare at that stomach in silence. She barely noticed the satisfied smirk of a plan coming together on Helen’s round face.

***


By the time Hannah’s internship was over, her goal was completed.

Sitting behind her desk, Dr. Schwartz had nearly doubled her starting weight. She was a big blue-haired ball of belly. It hung low and slapped against her thighs whenever she waddled around her office, burdensomely big and fabulously fleshy. What’s more, she had these chubby little appendages that were being buried from the top, her upperarms wobbled and sagged to bury her elbows, just as her knees were enveloped by the pillowy thigh fat a big round arsch that wobbled and weighed her down from behind. Everything about her had become soft, round, and jovial in appearance. Must have been the German in her. The glasses on her fat face pushed slightly into her round cheeks that rounded and met to melt into a waxing crescent double chin. The corners of her mouth, up until a few minutes ago, had born the breadth of her latest indulgence—more Mexican food went into that tubby little scientist than one might have thought.

In short, Dr. Schwartz had gotten fat. Very, very fat.

But between the psychological manipulation, being caught between two experts in the field, Hannah had paid a very dear price for her meager goals.

“I suppose you are wondering why I have called you here.” Dr. Schwartz spoke in her normal voice, not the pandering one she’d taken to dealing with Hannah since the discovery of her ambitions, “Yes, it is so that I may discuss your internship, but it is also moreso that I may discuss you. Hannah. And what you’ve tried to do here.”

Hannah Hammond, the woman who was once Hannah Hammond, had barely managed to keep ahold of herself throughout this internship. She’d completely fallen apart at the stimulation provided by the devious duo of doctors, falling entirely to seed.

She was a wreck. Her hair was messy, cut into a more manageable length but still somehow unattractive and unkempt. Her clothes were illfitting, simply because she couldn’t keep up with her size anymore. Angry red marks ran up and down her stomach, hips and thighs, evidence of her extreme and rapid expansion from Buttercombe Graduate to R&D Plaything. Her face was always red now, and her synapses had been fried. Between the drugs that McCarthy had been slipping her to increase her appetite and libido and the sexual torture that Dr. Schwartz had been putting her through by pressing on her fetish with all of her weight, Hannah had cracked. She mumbled often, her penchant for creepy eye contact taken care of entirely.

She and Schwartz were almost the same size.

“Hannah, are you aware that I am aware that you tried to drug me?” Helen asked rhetorically, her plump fingers steepling on the desk in front of her, “It’s true—very early into your career here, you attempted to slip a very caustic and highly addictive substance from our lab, called VX-32, into my coffee.”

Hannah’s eyes widened and something between a half-hearted attempt at explaining and an incoherent mumble came out. Helen pressed onward.

“I have done research on you, Fraulein. You’ve left quite the trail of figures in your wake.” Helen chuckled, grabbing a handful of her belly blubber and giving her gut a good shake, “And I suppose that you intended to do the same to me.”

Hannah’s gaze was everywhere, looking around the room like a mental patient. Maybe she’d be one by the time this was over? Helen could only guess.

“Well, despite evidence to the contrary, I want you to know that I’ve done this to myself.” Helen’s expression darkened as her belly settled down, “Independently of you. You have had no more control over me since your internship began than a flea controls the dog he bleeds from.”

The only sound that Hannah made was her manic breathing.

“And do you want to know why I did this to myself, Fraulein?” Helen cocked an eyebrow, “Because I am better than you at what it is you used to do.”

“You are a spoiled child with a need for control, playing Gott with persons because you believe yourself to be above them. Their wants, needs, emotions; they do not matter to you. The only thing that matters to you is that you remain in control.”

Dr. Schwartz took a sip of her tea.

“Und so, I have taken that control away from you.” She said with the utmost gravitas to her voice, “You will no longer feel superior to anyone as you struggle with what it is that I have done to you. That being turned you into the very sort of person you so desperately crave control over.”

“In short, and I suggest that you take these words to heart, do not fuck with me.”
152232111.title: Humongous Helen Halves Hannah

1522321111.content:
“What, exactly, happened to “I can lose weight any time I want?” my dear?”

Dr. McCarthy circled her oldest friend and fellow scientist like a vulture looming overhead. Not an inapt comparison, given the doctor’s tall stature and gaunt physique. Her long legs took slow strides as her shoes clicked against the tile of her laboratory. She tapped at her pointed chin inquisitively as she examined her colleague, squirming in her seat like so much the bloated piglet she’d allowed herself to become.

“I can.” Helen puffed, her jowls rippling as the crest of her chubby cheeks reddened, “I simply don’t want do.”

Helen had become enormous. Truly one of the largest women that Evie McCarthy had seen in all her adult life. And considering the sheer size of some of those cows, that was really saying something. Once merely a chubby little doctor with a sadistic streak, Helen had let herself go to the point of no return by now. As much as the tubby little tease liked to protest, no one got as fat as Helen Schwartz entirely on purpose.

“I don’t believe you.” Evie sneered, putting her hands on the back of the reinforced, custom-built chair that Helen was currently squatting in, “I think, after all of those years blowing up interns into parade floats, you were really just working something out. Something deep and visceral…”

Evie’s breathing was almost as shallow as her partner’s. The air hung thick with tension as Evie seethed between her teeth. Seeing Helen like this, finally after all of these years teasing her and egging her on. Helen had gone and gotten fatter than Evie could have ever possibly dreamed. It made her obsessively, incredibly hot. She was boiling over, just as Helen’s fat gut had rolled over the arm-rests of her custom made Yeng recliner.

“I think you are projecting, Evie.” Helen said in the sweetest tone, her puddle of a face rippling as she clicked her tongue, “Are you going to tell me that you don’t enjoy me at this size? Hmm?”

Dr. Schwartz spread her sausage fingers as far apart as they would go, battling against the bulkiness of her own body as she grabbed a handful of her stupendous stomach and sloshed its meaty mass to one side. From the crown of her swollen breasts to the lowest roll that hung heavily to her calves, Helen Schwartz’s stomach swayed lazily like a tree in the wind. Her fat little face beamed as she watched Dr. McCarthy practically bite through her bottom lip.

“You fucking cow.” Evie said in a raspy voice, “You’re an absolute blob, Helen. You do know that, right?”

“Und you say that like you don’t adore me.” The jumbo German scientist said in her slower, huskier voice, “Do not lie to me Evie. If it were not me in this predicament, it would most assuredly be you.”

You could almost see Dr. McCarthy’s brain begin to spark at the instigation of that remark. Her issues were hers and hers alone, buried underneath years of repression and sadism.

“That… was an ugly thing to say. Implying that I’d ever let myself become as morbidly massive as you have, Helen was… a low blow.” Evie’s unsettlingly wide grin returned to her face once more, more shaken than shattered by Dr. Schwartz’s playful accusation,

“However, I suppose that you’re getting cocky as you get closer to the big 8-0-0. It’s to be expected that your ego keeps track with that gut of yours.”

“It is to be expected!” Helen chirped happily, “I am only matched in girth by the size of my big, beautiful brain.”

“For now.” Evie crossed her arms over her chest, standing over the blue-haired blob with a hungry expression on her face

“For now.” Helen winked, hefting up an upper tier of her sagging stomach and letting it fall back into place with a hearty wet slap, “I have so much more room to grow, Evie. Are you not enthralled by the idea of me becoming even larger than I am now? Hmm?”

“I’m very, very enthralled by the idea of that.” Evie licked her lips

“Not as enthralled as I am by the idea of lunch.” Helen purred as she began kneading her stomach, “If I am to reach 800 before my projected rate, I will require all of your attention, Evie.”

The beached blob rose her eyebrows and began running her fat little hands up and down whatever surface area of her great stomach she could reach. It wasn’t much.

“Now, be a good girl und go get me a stick of fried butter from the vendor on the pier. I have developed quite a taste for those.”
1522321111.title: A Whole Lotta Helen for the Epilogue

153.content:
This is an option reserved for exploring what the world might be like if Piper had always been fat.

Canonically, Piper used to be very heavy. A combination of good genes, a well-timed growth spurt, and a willingness to explore the surrounding Port helped slim her down from a two-hundred and fifty pound teenager into the fiesty, flashy firecracker that we all know and love. In the stories that follow this option, we're going to see what Piper would have been like if she'd never lost her "puppy fat".

This is somewhat different than your typical weight gain story route, because the character has always been overweight here. While she, and anyone else, can continue to gain weight, a lot of the fun is exploring how different (and conversely, how similar) the "fat" version of Piper's life is compared to the original.

The butterfly effect is strong here! Piper having never slimmed down might affect who she's friends with, or how people feel about her. This can include her family, her friends like Dakota and Zack, and even more auxillary characters that make up the corners of her life. The Pipers below are not simply fat versions of the original, rather, they're Pipers who for one reason or another, were never thin, buxom, and "sexy" to begin with.

Keep that in mind, moving forward!

Now, before we begin, here are your options as to just how "alternate" you want this reality to be...




Piper Black, Big Fat Friend—
For as long as she could remember, Piper has had a weight problem.

She was always the heaviest among her friends, going back as far as Middle School. Her mother has always been supportive about her body-image, even if her stupid older sister teases her constantly about how big she is. But Harper’s babying of her daughter has only facilitated her to keep growing.

Piper’s a bit more insecure than you might remember her. Instead of going out and exploring Daven's Port, Piper finds herself much more at home behind her computer screen, casually browsing social media and watching TV. A frequent boredom/stress snacker, Piper is much more at home in baggy hoodies than she is in tight t-shirts. Since she’s not as confident, she’s also got a long history of one-way crushes. While not nearly as outgoing as her "primary" counterpart, this Piper is a bit more scholarly and level-headed, if somewhat sensitive about her weight. She’s just a big ol’ marshmallow in this reality, who would lose weight if it just weren’t so hard!

Her best friends are Dakota Johnson, the new girl from Texas who offered to be her gym buddy, and Maggie Moreau, a fellow lazy (but skinny!) girl whose family’s bakery Piper frequents. Her mortal enemy, Kara Cutter, still taunts her even after high school.

Piper’s starting weight in this reality is two hundred and fifty pounds.



Piper Black, Extra-Large, Extra In-Charge—
Instead of being known for the bustiest women in town, the Black Family are some of the biggest girls around!

Do you know how easy it is to be fat and stay fat when you’re poor? The Black Family does. Going back as far as their great grandmother, their whole family has always been comprised of total cows. Harper, Parker, and Piper Black are all grade-A heifers here!

Piper’s never thought much about diets or exercise, and why should she? Her mother has always been overly positive and all-too supportive about her "full figure"; Piper's mom practically did everything she could to keep her and her sister very well-fed. It ain’t like she’s got much of a choice in the matter, after all, might as well enjoy all of her extra-ness! Aside from being much more "loud and proud" about her size, the downside to such an enabling, spoiled upbringing is that Piper’s boisterous personality is a bit more abrasive and one-sided—she’s got no tolerance for those skinny chicks who look down their noses at her and all her extra helpings!

Her best friend is Madi Pines, a more shy and demure kind of fat girl who admires Piper’s confidence. Recently she’s been rubbing against the wrong way from Dakota Johnson, some skinny twig from Texas, and the two butt heads quite often around town.

Piper’s starting weight in this reality is over three hundred and fifty pounds.
153.title: Big Beginnings: the Piper Black Edition

154.content:
The year is 4183
Through various means ranging from the unpredictable to completely outrageous, the girl you call 'Piper Black' has transcended her humble roots and became the one who we call:
The Holy Reigning Goddess Queen and Empress of Reality Herself, Immortal as She May Be!
We know, most of those titles do not correlate or even make sense BUT Daven's Port is a strange place, you know that much.
However!
Do you know your history when it comes to The Holy Reigning Goddess Queen and Empress of Reality Herself, Immortal as She May Be?!
...Or is it your future...or present...or maybe it really is your past...
I don't know, time is strange!

Prepare yourself, for a vast array of knowledge is about to be passed to you!


Not So Sweet Sixteen
Your present knows Piper as a 19 year old girl, BUT did you know that, before she was 19, she was also 16?
Yes, three years prior to your acquaintances, Piper was a younger girl than you knew!
And oh how terrible she was.
You see, her youth did come with a vicious streak of jealousy which tended to fixate on her poor sister, Parker, who couldn't help but flaunt her success with men to her younger sister.
The Holy Reigning Goddess Queen and Empress of Reality Herself, Immortal as She May Be did not suffer such insolence lightly and poor unknowing Parker did have such a penchant for stuffing her face...

Like Mother Like Daughter
Knowing Piper, you must all be so familiar with Harper, her mother, no?
Lovely woman, The Holy Reigning Goddess Queen and Empress of Reality Herself, Immortal as She May Be immortalised her mother also, allowing her to live peacefully beside her as the years rolled by completely free of the worries that had plagued the Blacks.
Did you know though that Piper spent some time following in her mother's footsteps, namely in producing her own brood.
Yes, the Piper you know would become a mother in due course and what a wonderful mother she did become, naturally developing her ways of leadership with the little sprogladites before becoming our saviour no doubt.

These are just some of the tales that lay the path for our great leader but there are more, if you care to explore further of course...

choices: Piper's cravings only get stronger as time goes by
Piper isn't alone in expecting
Darren's eagerness to help has an underlying fetishised motive
1542.content:
Five years in your future, with The Holy Reigning Goddess Queen and Empress of Reality Herself, Immortal as She May Be situated at the youthful age of 24, Piper is pregnant.
The father, an out of towner who you would have not met so far, wooed our leader over the course of years before finally the couple indulged themselves in a child.
This is the start of that story...


"Babe..." groaned a familiar voice from deep within the bed covers, half asleep in its tone.
Snoring...
"Babe!" hissed Piper much louder than before, only to receive a shallow grunt in return before the snoring commenced.
"For gods sake...babe!"
A flying elbow to the back was added this time what seemed to do the trick.

Darren nearly threw himself clean from the bed as he woke with a start and an oddly painful spot in his back.

"Oh good, you're awake" cooed Piper with innocence dripping from her tongue as she feigned all knowledge of hitting her beau to wake him.

"Sorry hun, I was whacked, are you ok?" asked Darren with genuine concern in his own voice, all feelings of pain quickly forgotten as he looked to his pregnant girlfriend.

"No I'm not" huffed Piper with an overly dramatic flounce in her mannerisms, laying it on thicker as she went.

"Do we need to go to the hospital?!"
Starting to freak out slightly, Darren really did launch himself from bed this time and started to hurriedly pull clothes onto his body.
The sight was quite amusing and Piper had to break her rouse to snort at her flailing boyfriend.

"Only if 'hospital' is code for kitchen, I am starving" groaned Piper again, struggling to bite back her wryness.

"Oh...thank god...yeah we can sort that"
His usual warmness came flooding back realising that there was no immediate danger, as foolish as thinking that leaving Piper hungry wasn't dangerous was.
"You coming with me or you want waiting on in bed?" asked Darren, no sarcasm, just a genuine question.

"Nah, I'll come with, gotta stretch this little sucker out for a bit" groaned Piper as she lethargically swung herself to the edge of the bed.

"LITTLE sucker?" teased Darren as he glimpsed Piper heave herself labouriously from bed.

"Yeah yeah, laugh it up lover boy" retorted Piper having finally made it to her feet "this'll be your problem once I can't walk"

Piper did have to admit though that Darren's jibe was probably well placed.
At only five months gone, Piper looked fit to burst already.
Wearing a light purple lace camisole that parted down the middle, Piper was the poster girl for pregnancy at this point, albeit looking like she was advertising a full term bump.
At least the baby had been kind to her, Piper's bump was perfectly smooth and round all over.
That wasn't to say that she hadn't taken on some pregnancy weight elsewhere though and, as to be expected, her rack hadn't stopped growing along with the extra hip padding.

"I'll meet you down stairs Pip, might as well start whilst you're waddling down" teased Darren again before her bounced down the stairs.

"Douche!" shouted Piper lovingly, even if there was a touch of bite to her words.

"I love you too Pippy!" was the response.

Piper rolled her eyes as she rubbed her belly.
"You are going to be the death of me" uttered Piper in the direction of her distended olive tinted stomach.
Much to her amazement, stretch marks had not been an issue despite her size and Piper had to admit she did find the whole thing pretty arousing, but that was mostly hormones, right?
As if in response to her previous statement, Piper's belly growled slightly, instilling a giggle from the mum-to-be.
"Alright, I'm going! You are not going to be happy until I'm mum bod-ed are you kid?"
Probably not appeared to be the answer.

*****

"How did that go down?" asked Darren from the other side of the table having just watched Piper practically inhale a tables worth of food.

"Gre...BUURP!...at" belched Piper whilst rubbing her belly again which had now parted her camisole to fully expose her bump which glowed slightly in the kitchen light.

"Think you'll get through the night now seeing as it's 3:41" asked Darren, mentally working out how much more sleep he would get before leaving for work.

"Hmmm, possibly" Piper thought as she rubbed her belly.
'Damn that feels good' she mentally groaned.

"I can get you something else if you want?" offered Darren almost foolishly.

Piper's interest was piqued.
"Like what?"

He had been roped in now.
"I guess we could do a drive through run if you want?"

"Aww baby, you don't have to, you're the best!"
Piper got far too excited at the prospect of more food but she didn't particularly care.
A more aware individual would probably point out at this point that Piper's cravings were playing a significant part in her pregnancy gains, particularly on her lower half and around her bump for the more keen eyed, but that had long been justified as 'eating for two' or 'it'll go once I have the baby'

If only she knew...

First and foremost, this is a story about a young woman, Piper Black, gaining weight and getting fat. Probably getting really fat. If you don't like the main idea here, I would strongly suggest you hit the back button located somewhere on your internet browser.

Piper Black has finally gotten an interactive of her own in this epic adventure of friends, fun in the sun, and most importantly food! She's one of the most beautiful women in Daven's Port, and she's not going to let a few measly pounds and inches stop her from having fun. Piper takes the spotlight in this interactive, which can take our Dark Horse character from one end of the Port to the other, and beyond!

Be warned! I do uphold a certain amount of quality control, but please don't let that discourage you from contributing. This is an interactive, and so long as you do your best and things don't get too crazy, I'll be more than happy to keep your chapters posted.
